entry.title: The power of AWS Chalice for quick serverless API development in Python
entry.summary:
Description

The Serverless Framework enables us to create and deliver high-quality applications fast and easily without having to worry too much about setting up resources and configurations. AWS Chalice is a serverless Python framework that can help you launch your serverless application quickly. In this presentation, you will discover the â€¦
entry.content:
Description

The Serverless Framework enables us to create and deliver high-quality applications fast and easily without having to worry too much about setting up resources and configurations. AWS Chalice is a serverless Python framework that can help you launch your serverless application quickly. In this presentation, you will discover the key features of AWS Chalice and how it can be used to quickly write, build and deploy serverless applications in python.
